alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, southeastern Anderson, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Abbeville, or near Donalds, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Belton, Honea Path, Ware Shoals, Due West, Gray Court, Donalds, Shoals Junction and Donaldson Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville
